page.title: 07FASHIONS
page.content: Summer 1985,s fashions give a very casual outlook.Cotton trousers rolled up at the bottom are the in thing at the moment.Canvas shoes are very popular with the girls.The in colours are lemon, pale pink, lilac,light blue and turquoise.Stilettos are another craze to wear. These are very pointed at the toes and the name stilettos comes from the heels.The ladies skirts are normally very tight and short or not so tight and much longer.Big flowers on skirts and blouses are also fashionable.Hats are not in the fashion at the moment.luminous socks are fashionable,mostly worn by the young.When it is cooler the fashion is a Gallini jumper.In the hotter weather there are Gabicci teashirts for the boys.
